item.title: Lvm Snapshot Backup and Restore Guide
item.description: Overview This document explains how to perform block-level backup and restore of an LVM logical volume using: LVM snapshots (point-in-time consistency) dd (block copy) pigz (parallel compression) ssh (secure transfer) This method is suitable for: Full system backup Bare-metal restore scenarios Disaster recovery preparation Exact disk state preservation Backup Transfer Methods Two supported transfer methods are available: Method A — SSH Streaming Pipeline Method B — SCP File Transfer Environment Example Component Value Volume Group ubuntu-vg Root Logical Volume ubuntu-lv Snapshot Name root_snap Backup Server 10.
